person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: But Singapore had the support of other WTO members .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Singapore |

Even though "Singapore" is mentioned in the paragraph, it is the only person entity present. The phrase "other WTO members" is a group of people, but it is not mentioned as specific individuals in the text.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Singapore |

The phrase "other WTO members" is not a specific individual or group of individuals, but rather a general category of people. Therefore, it does not clearly refer to a "Person" entity. The only specific "Person" entity in the paragraph is "Singapore".

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: But Singapore had the support of other WTO members .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| WTO |

In the paragraph, "WTO" is the only organization mentioned. It stands for World Trade Organization. It is a valid organization entity as it is a global international organization that deals with the global rules of trade between nations.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |

In the paragraph, "WTO" is the only organization mentioned. The other term "Singapore" refers to a country and not an organization. Therefore, the valid organization entity is WTO.
